attributes.action: Get all stranded Brits back home safely from all countries across the globe.
attributes.additional_details: A cry for help on behalf of all stranded British nationals. Stranded on remote islands in the Philippines, stranded in South American countries, sleeping rough on the streets of third world countries. British nationals stranded in dangerous and unknown areas of the world. Surviving on limited funds, no access to healthcare, shelter, food and water. Having to ask and beg locals for help. Targets for kidnaps and muggings. Something needs to be done quickly to bring back these vulnerable citizens.
attributes.background: To go about contacting all British nationals stranded in countries around the world, then supporting and aiding their return back to the UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307260

Since you started your petition the Government has announced a new government partnership with airlines to fly back more tourists stranded abroad: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/new-government-partnership-with-airlines-to-fly-back-more-tourists-stranded-abroad

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
